page.title: 18Broughton Castle:Banbury (2)
page.content: The Castle has been in the {Saye and Sele family} since 1370. There have been {21 Saye and Seles}. There was a man called Saye who came over from France in the middle ages. Most people came from France and he settled in Kent and he was a rich and mportant man. King Henry V1 made him Baron in 1447. He lived in a place called Sele in Kent he added Sele onto his name to make Saye and Sele. Every year Broughton Castle has about {18000 visitors}. One of the most famous people to visit was the {Crown Prince of Japan} with his wife and family. The Castle has needed recent repairs because of Death Watch Beetle which eats stones and wood. At the moment the Castle has scaffolding around the western wing.
